A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am sure this movie ruined a lot of people's Christmas! It is a terribly written and directed movie. Some good effects but that is to be expected with a high budget film now days. It seems like they focused too much on the PC movement and not on the actual story telling aspect. All and all I am going to do my best to pretend that I didn't see the Last Jedi because it really does ruin the other great Star Wars movies. I would recommend this movie to an enemy.
